comments: Carol my instructor for Pharmacology. One of the most unorganized instructors I have ever had.

I had Carol for Pharm. Worst professor at DCTC. Not helpful, doesn\'t care to help/teach, nothing is ever her fault, condescending comments made to students. Referred to one student as "stupid" & don\'t ever wear pink to her class, it\'s "hideous" & she will make that known. Unfortunately she teaches too many classes.

Carol is an amazing teacher. She pushes you to work your hardest and be the best nurse you can be! And she is ALWAYS there to offer a helping hand if you are willing to put forth the effort and time needed in nursing school.Overall an awesome teacher who truly cares for her students and wants them to succeed as quality nurses!

If you want ot learn to be an independant and smart student she is the professor for you. she will not hold your hand, but she will make you into one of the health care workers that everyone loves and depends on.

She is a techer that will help you to learn and help you to become a smart independant strong student. if you want a teacher to hold your hand she is not for you. but of you want to learn and be a good health career worker she is the prfessor for you!!!!!!

Nothing is ever her fault. She never responds to e-mails and when she does she doesn\'t address the content. She favors students and picks ones to fail. For a teacher, she seems to hate students. She needs to leave the teaching scene.

I had Carol for Pharm in my 2nd semester and Mental Health in my 3rd. Pharm was extremely hard, and I did not feel like I could look to her for help. Mental health was a whole other story. The tests were a joke, but she was very fair in correcting her mistakes, however...nothing is ever her fault.
